Summary: bright white light that flashed like an welding arc
divs: Sighting Detailswhile traveling south early morning,I saw bright white light that flashed like a welding arc as it traveled across the sky in front of me. It soon came to a dead stop in the sky where it stayed until it was out of my view.I was unable to stop to investigate as I was on on my way to work.
trends: There have been no other sightings in northamton
This sighting has never been favorited.
